---
name: generate-azd
description: Generate azd (Azure Developer CLI) project scaffolding and modular Bicep templates.
---

/generate-azd

**Purpose:** DevOps agent creates all necessary Bicep modules and azd project files.

**Instructions:**
- Create a new subfolder called _demo-builder_. Generate all necessary azd files in this folder.  
- Generate the `infra` folder structure with modular Bicep.
- List and create key modules (networking, identity, compute, etc.) using best practices.
- Output a README with deployment steps.
